descp2: string, callable or None, optional, default: None A string (see model evaluation documentation) or a scorer callable object / function with signature ``scorer(estimator, X, y)`` which should return only a single value. Similar to :func:`cross_validate` but only a single metric is permitted. If None, the estimator's default scorer (if available) is used.
